item.title: Who is the best player on Boston's top line?
item.description: The Boston Bruins drafted David Pastrnak in 2014. The impact that he would come to make with line mates, Brad Marchand and Patrice Bergeron, is something in the Boston organization that fans will remember for a very long time. Itâ€™s easy to think of all that they have accomplished together, but we will dive into which one of the three players has had the biggest impact and the best statistics playing together as the top line in Boston.
